apps.localizedDescription:
uYou is the best tweak for the YouTube app.
 
 uYouEnhanced is a modified version of qnblackcat's uYouPlus & MiRO92's uYou with even more features.
 
 Additional features:
 • Skip sponsorships in videos (iSponsorBlock)
 • Even more PiP options (YouPiP)
 • Unlock 1440p and 2160p resolutions (YTUHD)
 • Disable overlay at the end of videos (YTNoHoverCards)
 • Remove YouTube Premium upsell alerts (NoYTPremium)
 • Enable to Dim the YouTube UI (LowContrastMode)
 • Enable the miniplayer for all videos (YTMiniplayerEnabler)
 • Prevent the notch/Dynamic Island from cutting into 2:1 videos (DontEatMyContent)
 • Configure A/B settings in the YouTube app (YTABConfig)
 • Adds a new button in the Video Player that allows you to copy a url with the ?t=timestamp (YouTimeStamp)
 • And more
 
 More information: 
 https://github.com/arichornlover/uYouEnhanced/ 
 
 Requires iOS/iPadOS 15.0 or later.
 
 Contributors: qnblackcat, PoomSmart, level3tjg, BandarHelal, galactic, julioverne, Foxster, CokePokes, arichornlover, bhackel and many others. 

 Credits: MiRO92, HASHBANG, galactic, Lyvendia, ichitaso, Ahmed Bafkir, Tommy Teo, Dayanch96, theos, dodieboy, balackburn and many others.
apps.name: uYouEnhanced

privacy.name: AppleMusic
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.

privacy.name: BluetoothPeripheral
privacy.usageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.

privacy.name: Camera
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.

privacy.name: Contacts
privacy.usageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.

privacy.name: LocalNetwork
privacy.usageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.

privacy.name: LocationWhenInUse
privacy.usageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.

privacy.name: Microphone
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.

privacy.name: NSUserTrackingUsageDescription
privacy.usageDescription: A message that informs the user why an app is requesting permission to use data for tracking the user or the device.

apps.subtitle: uYouEnhanced is a tweak for the YouTube app.
apps.versionDescription:
• Updated YouTube to v19.40.4
 • uYou is using 3.0.4
 • New Option: Replace YT Download with uYou 
 • Updated Copy Settings button (most of the keys were changed, might affect backups.) 
 • Updated App Version Spoofer (23+ additonal YT versions!) 
 • Updated Alderis (iOS 18+ Fix) 
 • Updated Submodules
